t:type.name: NotificationLog
t:type.t:description: Represents a single entry in a notification_log table

t:attribute.name: notificationKey
t:attribute.description: message/notification key to identify the message

t:attribute.name: hourOfDay
t:attribute.description: The hour of day the notification is sent

t:attribute.name: sendTime
t:attribute.description: The timestamp when the notification is sent

t:attribute.name: method
t:attribute.description: The notification method such as EMAIL, PUSH or IVR

t:attribute.name: personId
t:attribute.description: The UUID of the person the notification is sent to
